name: portal-app
description: my-ext-gen-app description for Ext JS app MyExtGenApp
author: Sencha, Inc.

scripts.build:desktop: npm run clean && cross-env webpack --env profile=desktop --env environment=production --env treeshake=yes
scripts.build:phone: npm run clean && cross-env webpack --env profile=phone --env environment=production --env treeshake=yes
scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env webpack --env environment=production --env treeshake=yes
scripts.testing:desktop: npm run clean && cross-env webpack --env treeshake=yes --env cmdopts=--testing --env cmdopts=--build=desktop
scripts.testing:phone: npm run clean && cross-env webpack --env treeshake=yes --env cmdopts=--testing --env cmdopts=--build=phone
scripts.testing: npm run clean && cross-env webpack --env treeshake=yes --env cmdopts=--testing
